website_summaries.verdict: Although fairly basic, if you're looking for a highly adjustable model with a straightforward design, this drafting table is worth a look.
pros: Earns praise for the attractive birch top that is very easy to adjust
Height is also adjustable – you can use the table in a standing position
cons: Rare reports of tabletop arriving damaged
Customer service could be more attentive

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews are right, adjust the height before you place the table.
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed that the table came chipped, twice. The scratch on the side isn’t a big deal, but the wood decal was peeling on the front and it’s created a bubble. Maybe I was unlucky, whoever packed it, or it was made cheaply made. Update: the sellers will not take responsibility for the item. Caution when purchasing yours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to the drawing and look hard. Can be confusing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter. She is an artist. Putting the desk together was easy for me but for some it maybe difficult because of the drawing. It is somewhat unclear in two places that are important for proper assembly. One place where it is unclear is the adjustable legs. They have a tab for pivot point on them and if you put them in wrong it will not work. The other point in the drawing where it is unclear on the drawing is the metal hight adjusters. If they are backwards it will not go into position. All in all it is a great desk that my daughter loved. Love the finish and the adjustability.
customer_reviews.author: the Goose

customer_reviews.title: Good table. Wish the tray was larger on bottom front to keep my work from sliding
customer_reviews.text: Came promptly and in great condition. I wish the tray/lip on the bottom was larger. My work keeps sliding off when I have it tilted up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Good value, wish it was a tad higher.
customer_reviews.text: Good lookong desk that feels rather sturdy. It wasnt too difficult to put together but there were a lot of steps so took awhile. Overall a great desk for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Kent

customer_reviews.title: Impressive / Money's worth / but Ran into problem ordering form Amazon
customer_reviews.text: This standing, drawing table is really a bargain. Nicely made, easy to assemble, sturdy, and functional. Only have 2 complaints: no rim to keep paper on the table surface when tilted; table surface is textured. I did run into a problem ordering via Amazon. The desk arrived incomplete, not enough feet were included. Stand Up Desk Store customer service couldn't help, had to go through Amazon customer service. Although Amazon CS tried their best, they could not obtain the part for me. Instead, I was given a credit for ordering a 'similar' part. Being only a furniture foot and 3.5 - 6.5 weeks delivery time frame, returned the desk to Amazon and ordered directly from the shipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good, Sturdy, Easy To Assemble
customer_reviews.text: The first order arrived damaged, but I sent it back and ordered a replacement. The second order arrived, but was missing a screw from the parts list. I emailed the seller and received a response 24 hours later advising me they would send out a complete replacement set of screws. I was satisfied. The table looks nice, and is sturdy. It took me about 45 minutes to assemble, and that was because the instructions were simple to follow. You will want to assemble the leg bracing pieces only hand tight until all the parts have been connected. Then tighten all the screws securely, but not too tight. Remember, too much torque will bend the metal.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Loving my drafting table
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a small drafting table that would be easy to move by myself. This is perfect. It is not too heavy or unwieldy. I can move it, carefully, by myself--I am an average size woman, and not particularly strong. I would definitely recommend it if you are looking for a smaller and lighter drafting table. The assembly was not super easy, and I needed help getting the top on, but otherwise I did it all myself. Assembly wasn't horrible, but it was not the easiest thing I have ever put together. There are videos online you can watch, but they sometimes do not show detail. Anyway, I like this overall and would recommend it or buy it again. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Retro Girl

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This drafting table is perfect. It was pretty easy to assemble, just give yourself time with the parts and instructions. The table itself is really well made, and extremely sturdy. The only issue is things can slide off, but with a little bit of painters tape that is not an issue. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JkWitt

customer_reviews.title: Spotty build quality
customer_reviews.text: While most of this desk is steel, it is a very thin gauge. The parts were not fixtured very carefully before welding, so the table is full of small gaps and mis-alignments. None of these presented a serious issue for assembly, but they're ugly and lower the perceived quality a lot. The weld spatter was not well cleaned up, and the paint is very thin. The cosmetic plastic parts do not fit very well at all. The two shoes that protect the front legs are only retained by one pin, and are otherwise free to move around. After assembly, the desk works well, and the adjustment mechanism seems like it will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing Amazon - desk received less than satisfactory condition
customer_reviews.text: I believe this came from Amazon directly and not a seller, not that it should matter. The delivered box looked opened and retaped which was not indicated, that I could see, in the details when I ordered. There were 2 screws missing during assembly. There are multiple dents in the actual desk. There was also chipped plastic on the base covers. Very disappointing. Being a loyal customer of Amazon, this experience makes me reconsider. I recommend the desk, decent quality, especially for the price. We're keeping it because we need it for remote school. But again, makes me think about discontinuing my purchasing on Amazon if if the quality continues to disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: donutsandicecream

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: The top of the table is about waist high. I'm 5 foot 10. So it's the perfect height for working on drawings or paintings while standing. For me, this has value because I get lower back issues from sitting too much. It was well packaged. The chair in the photo is adjusted all the way up and the ruler is to the left is a 4 footer to give it scale. Well satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MisterMedusa

It works great for drafting and drawing needed for her program. It was pretty easy to assemble and it’s VERY sturdy. The only down side is raising and lowering isn’t nearly as easy as tilting.

(I didn't want baby colored furniture that would have to be traded out at some point.) This table adjusts in height and is perfect for them now and I imagine they will be using it years from now.

customer_reviews.title: NIce desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is a very nice desk for drawing, but my one and only complaint is the finish of the desk top is not smooth. When drawing if you do not have something under your drawing you will feel and see the grain of the desk top in your drawing. I put a square glass pallet under my drawings to fix that and now works great.

customer_reviews.title: Do a bit of research, it pays
customer_reviews.text: This drafting table is every bit of what you described. All the parts fit with precision. The directions were spot on although sections (3&6) parts 13 and 14 slowed me down a bit due to poor drawings. Never-the less I scatched my head once or twice and before you know it the table was completed. My one suggestion is to put it all together with out tightening the nuts and screws until its completely assembled. After all is well tighten your hardware up to your satisfaction.

product_meta.title: Stand Up Desk Store Height Adjustable Drawing and Drafting Table with 39.2" W x 27.5" D Surface, Silver Frame with Birch Top
feature_bullets: VERSATILE DESIGN: A wide range of height adjustments as well as adjustments of the desktop angle allow this adjustable drawing and drafting table to also be used as a standing desk or conventional sit down desk.

ENHANCES PRODUCTIVITY: When used as a standing desk or a full height drafting table, you can enjoy increased focus, boosted calorie burn, and a safeguard against the health effects of a sedentary workday.
USER FRIENDLY FEATURES: Oversized thumb screws allow for easy angle and height adjustment while the extra large rubber feet provide a stable platform.
STURDY CONSTRUCTION: A robust steel frame and a durable powder coat finish ensure this drafting table/drawing desk withstands the rigors of daily use.
